body: this is my favorite art style... I wish there was more hentai with it

There are plenty of ways you can cook mushrooms, grilling them on coal is probably the best tho. Of course they need to be good sized to do so, not those frozen little ones you find at the supermarket.

Sucy would love some mushrooms cooked on a coal grill
